title: Added translation layer and some english translations
body:
- Very simple to expand upon and implement - only need to add **trans()** around a string
- Doesn't need alternate versions of the same file for each language so no duplicate code blocks to maintain

just finished adding a translation function trans(msg) to echarts() and
translated the text of many of the tooltip popups and other labels/text displayed
on the page from Chinese to English.   

I dont really know Chinese so the translations might not be perfect but its a good start.

The program now checks the browser language when it loads and if the language
happens to be 'en-US' it will return a translated phrase, if its not 'en-US' 
it returns the original text (Chinese).

I did it like this (keeping all the Chinese text in original spots and translating 
to english only if we're sure we got a en-US browser) because the developers clearly
use Chinese and it would probably be inconvenientand ONLY if en-US will it change) 
because as the program is obviously developed by people who do use Chinese it would
probably make things difficult if the default text wasnt in thier language.

Only 20 Phrases have been Translated so far but the function should provide an easy
way to quickly expand adding additional translations (and languages) as needed.

title: ZD-1 Fixed: Implement logarithmic scales
body:
Hi all,
We begin to use ECharts library in our company project. This is great tool which takes full advantage of canvas in terms of performance and interactivity. Here is my first attempt to slightly extend ECharts functionality and add Logarithmic axis option. (so for standard types 'value' and 'category' I add new one - 'logarithm'). Please - review this changes and decide whether it's appropriate for current project architecture.

Waiting for your feedback.

Thanks.

title: remove tooltips issue
body:
同一dom上多次init图表时出现的问题。这个问题在正确使用echarts时并不会出现，此次提交是希望提高echarts的容错能力。
具体问题是：我们在项目中使用带有tooltips的柱状图。如果第一次生成的实例中鼠标hover过（append了tooltips），然而在销毁实例时没有使用dispose方法正确销毁（比如直接将该dom的innerHTML=''）。
那第二次在此dom生成实例时，echarts会自动释放上一个实例。这时由于dom已为空（因为innerHTML设置为''），而echarts还会尝试移除tooltips，导致页面出错，无法生成新的实例。

body:
`main` 里的应该是一个文件一个字符串，不然在 wiredep 之类的工具里会被插入成

```
<script src="bower_components/ecomfe-echarts/build/echarts-plain-original.js, build/echarts-plain-original-map.js"></script>
```

repo.name: echarts
repo.description: Apache ECharts is a powerful, interactive charting and data visualization library for browser

title: line chart support image
body:
line chart support image

usage:

```
symbol: 'image://{$url}'
```

demo:

```
symbol: 'image://http://echarts.baidu.com/doc/asset/ico/favicon.png'
```

base64 demo:

```
symbol: 'image://data:image/png;base64,'
```

thx

title: 保存图片弹出的窗口在浏览器屏幕绝对居中，遮罩背景全屏铺满
body:
1、当浏览器有滚动条时保存图片窗口位于文档最上方，修正为浏览器铺满。
2、遮罩背景当浏览器尺寸变化时，修正遮罩会有部分缺失的问题。

repo.name: echarts
repo.description: Enterprise Charts

repo.name: echarts
repo.description: Apache ECharts is a powerful, interactive charting and data visualization library for browser

title: 保存图片弹出的窗口在浏览器屏幕绝对居中
body:
当浏览器有滚动条时，保存图片弹出的窗口一直在浏览器文档的top:0位置，滚动条滚动到下方时无法直接看到保存图片的窗口。
position修改为fixed保证弹出窗口一直在浏览器屏幕中央。
